title: Bloodline
description: While Vark, Soulmaster and corrupt ruler of Klatria, plots with the Nirvanan traitor to acquire the skull and kill the royals, insurrection grows from within the ranks of his own people. His intention to use Aislinnâ€™s parents as pawns to lure Aislinn to Klatria conceals his true intentions to destroy them all.
author: Diana Kemp
